game.name: Dream Arcade
game.shortDescription: An AI-driven creative game. As an arcade workshop clerk, you'll face AI customers with diverse demands. Your task is to modify classic games , adjust game levels to meet customers' needs, and with the manager's help, expand and strengthen the arcade workshop.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An AI-driven creative game. As an arcade workshop clerk, you'll face AI customers with diverse demands. Your task is to modify classic games , adjust game levels to meet customers' needs, and with the manager's help, expand and strengthen the arcade workshop.
